description: This notification is sent by AC when CAPWAP tunnel becomes up.
By this way, NMS will immediately know tunnel up event.
It is unnecessary to identify whether it is control or data
tunnel.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTunnelSetupTrap HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlUpInfo i 1 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr a 192.0.2.1 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime t 31536000 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPMacAddress s EXAMPL

description: To uniquely identify the CAPWAP tunnel set up between the AP
identified by APID and a specific AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID

description: Represents the reason for tunnel up.
The following values are supported:
up(1) - The AP joined AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlUpInfo

description: Represents name of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName

description: Represents IP address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr

description: Represents IPv6 address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with
the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime

description: Represents the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPMacAddress

description: This notification is sent by AC when CAPWAP tunnel becomes down.
By this way, NMS will immediately know tunnel down event.
It is unnecessary to identify whether it is control or data
tunnel.

event.Summary: CAPWAP tunnel is down due to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTunnelDownTrap HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnInfo i 1 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr a 192.0.2.1 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnCount i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPSysName s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime t 31536000 HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPMacAddress s EXAMPL

description: To uniquely identify the CAPWAP tunnel set up between the AP
identified by APID and a specific AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11CurrTunnelAPID

description: Represents the reason for tunnel down.
The following values are supported:
tunnelTimeout - When AC detects the tunnel is broken
- it will notify NMS.
keyUpdateFailure - rekey process is failed, tunnel will be broken.
apReset - Administrator reset AP.
apCrash - AP reboot for system crash.
apDeleted - Delete AP from AC and trigger tunnel down.
apCfgChange - The configuration for AP was changed.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnInfo

description: Represents name of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPName

description: Represents IP address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPIPAddr

description: Represents IPv6 address of the AP which sets up the tunnel with
the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPIPv6Addr

description: Represents how many times that the tunnel between AC and AP has down.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTunlDwnCount

description: Represents system name of the AP which sets up the tunnel with the AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapTnlAPSysName

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime

description: Represents the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapAPMacAddress

description: This trap is sent by AC when AC switches from master to slave
or from slave to master.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'AC switches from master to slave' : 'AC switches from slave to master'

description: Represents status which the AC switches to.
The following values are supported:
masterToSlave - The AC switches from master to slave.
slaveToMaster - The AC switches from slave to master.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtTrapBackupSwitchInfo

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMtFirstTrapTime

description: This trap is sent by AC when load-balance is enabled on AC.
Represents which kind load balance is enabled by AC.
The following values are supported:
traffic mode load-balancing: traffic snapshot is considered.
session mode load-balancing: the number of users associated
with the AP/radio is considered.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11LoadBalanceType

description: Represents the value of load balance threshold.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11LoadBalanceThreshold

description: This notification will be sent when STA is full on AC.

event.Summary: Reached maximum number of STA ($v1) on AC

description: Represents the max number of STA on AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACMaxStaNum

description: This notification will be sent when AC switches from standby to active
or from standby to active.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'AC switches from active to standby' : 'AC switches from standby to active'

description: Represents status which the AC switches to.
The following values are supported:
activeToStandby - The AC switches from active to standby.
standbyToActive - The AC switches from standby to active.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11ACStatusSwitchInfo

description: Represents the NMS IP address of master AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11SourceACNmsIP

description: The notification will be sent by AC when run AP number exceeds the threshold.

event.Summary: Number of APs ($v2) connecting to AC exceeded the threshold ($v1)

description: Represents the maximum number of AP connection permitted
for one AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11MaxAPNumPermitted

description: Represents the total number of APs which are connecting to AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11APConnectCount

description: The notification will be sent by AC when run AP number
recover normal from overload state.

event.Summary: Number of APs ($v2) connecting to AC are under the threshold ($v1)

description: Represents the maximum number of AP connection permitted
for one AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11MaxAPNumPermitted

description: Represents the total number of APs which are connecting to AC.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-ACMT-MIB::hh3cDot11APConnectCount
